content.title: Fall 2021.
content.description: Home is more than a place. It’s an experience of being known, being connected with others and finding purpose and meaning as we serve and love each other.  We never stopped being the church during COVID but it sure felt different and even though it will still be different this fall we want to welcome everyone to experience a sense of home as we share life and learn about Jesus together.

image1.alt: Young woman in a face mask is sitting and smiling off camera as she talks to a friend.
Young man in a face mask is sitting and talking with friends.

content.text1: Home is more than a place.  It’s an experience of being known, being connected with others and finding purpose and meaning as we serve and love each other.  This fall we want to welcome you to experience a sense of home as we share life and learn about Jesus together.

This fall, church is going to look and feel different as we begin to regather in person and navigate the ever changing reality of the COVID-19 pandemic.  However no matter how you feel about church we’re excited to help you get more engaged and get connected into community.

list.title: Sunday Mornings
list.text: The Sunday morning experience this fall will be a blend of in-person gatherings and online livestream experiences. So whether you feel comfortable meeting in person or would rather watch the livestream at home, you will be able to learn, grow and engage in the same teaching each week across all experiences. For now, click here to join our livestream on Sundays at 10 am.
list.imageAlt: Watching the teaching from Bruxy Cavey during The Meeting House Sunday morning livestream.

list.title: Home Church
list.text: This fall, we will have both in-person and online Home Churches, across all of our parishes, where you can share life, grow deeper spiritual friendship, ask questions and talk openly about living out the teachings of Jesus. Click here to find a group you can connect with.
list.imageAlt: Online home church meeting using zoom.

list.title: Kids and Youth
list.text: We love kids and youth and we are excited that we will be able to start meeting back in-person this fall. The availability and type of kids and youth programs will vary depending on the parish so check out your local parish page to learn about the programs at your parish.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

content.text1: We are created to live, grow and thrive in community. This fall there are lots of opportunities for you to get involved in helping out, either on a Sunday morning or through out the week in our neighbourhoods.

image1.alt: A woman is on her phone outside.

content.text1: We have been called to a life of radical generosity, like Jesus! Giving is a great first step to declaring your commitment to Jesus, and this church family. Thank you!

image1.alt: A viewer is watching The Meeting House livestream on their laptop.
A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Subscribe to our email list and stay on top of the changing circumstances as we navigate this pandemic.
